kannada_original: ಕಾಲ ಕಂಬದ ಮೇಲೆ ಬಾಳ ತಂತಿಯ ಕಟ್ಟಿ
english_transliteration: Kāḷa kambada mēle bāḷa tantiya kaṭṭi
english_translation: Tying the string of life onto the pillar of time
Holding the stick of hope, the game proceeds.

kannada_original: ಮುಗ್ಗರಿಸೆ ಅದು ಸೋಲು, ನಡೆಯುತಿರೆ ಅದು ಗೆಲುವು
english_transliteration: Muggarise adu sōlu, naḍeyutire adu geluvu
english_translation: If you stumble, that is defeat; if you keep walking, that is victory
Life is an acrobat's game (tightrope walk) – Muddu Rama.
